duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle cases from start to finish with attention to quality-control of documentation, translations, forms, addresses, and government fees.
Answer questions from clients and provide case status updates to lead attorney.
Conduct immigration client intake interviews and draft emails and/or letters to clients and U.S. Government.
Collect and assess the documentation provided by the clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Law, Immigration Law, or related field (Master's preferred)
